thread.title: Funeral of Jim Carrey's ex-girlfriend Cathriona White to be held in Ireland
thread.title_full: Funeral of Jim Carrey's ex-girlfriend Cathriona White to be held in Ireland

title: Funeral of Jim Carrey's ex-girlfriend Cathriona White to be held in Ireland
text:
Funeral of Jim Carrey's ex-girlfriend Cathriona White to be held in Ireland Funeral of Jim Carrey's ex-girlfriend Cathriona White to be held in Ireland 
Press Association 2014 / / National Entertainment News Share 
The funeral of Jim Carrey’s ex-girlfriend is to be held in Ireland at the weekend when she will be laid to rest beside her late father. 
Make-up artist Cathriona White was found dead in a house in Sherman Oaks, California on September 28 with the Hollywood star describing her death as like being “hit with a lightning bolt”. 
The 30-year-old from the village of Cappawhite in Co Tipperary had moved to LA in 2009 and took roles as an extra on a television show before working behind the scenes. Cathriona White (@littleirishcat/PA) 
Jim, 53, dated Cathriona for a while in 2012 and they were pictured hand in hand in New York earlier this year. 
It has been reported that the movie star wished to attend the funeral in Ireland. 
Her funeral Mass will take place on October 10 at Our Lady of Fatima Church, Cappawhite, followed by burial next to her father Pat in the village cemetery. 
A death notice said she was sadly missed by her sisters and brothers Lisa, James, Larina, Sarah and Tadhg, her stepmother Brid, mother Brigid, grandmother Lily, grandfather James and extended family members and a wide circle of friends. 
The message was posted online by White’s Funeral Home, the local undertakers run by members of Cathriona’s family. 
They asked for flowers only at the service and donations, if desired, to The Simon Community and the Circle of Friends Tipperary. Share article 
The death was being treated as suicide with the Los Angeles County Coroner’s Office leading the investigation. Promoted Stories
